chapter.title: Frequently Asked Questions
chapter.para: Q: Where are the config files for FreeNono?
A: All config files are found under ".FreeNono" in your users home directory. The location of your user directory depends on the used operating system.
Q: Although a maximum game time is set, the game still runs after exceeding it. How can a solve this problem?
A: If an older version of FreeNono was used, a problem with reading the configuration can occure. Delete the whole config file and restart FreeNono.
Q: Something does not work like expected or how it should be. What can I do?

A: At first you should delete the entire config directory and restart FreeNono. If that does not help, it could be a bug in FreeNono. Please mail us all bug reports and feature requests to the mail address below.
More questions? Write us an email to info@freenono.org.
